profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional full-stack development and business consulting aspects, with no specific mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. While it involves software development and data analysis, it lacks the core elements required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: de implementatie van softwareoplossingen te realiseren
Om aan de behoeften van onze klanten te voldoen
de zakelijke/accounting/financiële concepten leert die van het project/product worden verwacht
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate understanding client needs, defining solutions, and learning business concepts relevant to projects, which aligns with understanding the business context and translating needs.

The core title is 'Full Stack Developer', and the description explicitly mentions building web applications, managing software development and implementation, and working with development teams, all of which are core to software development.
The mention of working on data analysis projects and using SQL/NoSQL databases suggests involvement in data handling and processing, which are aspects of data engineering.
Working in multidisciplinary teams and coaching colleagues points to strong communication and collaboration skills.

phrases: investeren we wereldwijd voortdurend in de ontwikkeling van onze teamleden
onboardingtraining van het team (technisch en niet-technisch) op tijd af te ronden
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on continuous development, learning new tools like Git, understanding business concepts, and completing training highlights a need for learning and adaptability.
The mention of using innovative tools and transforming clients suggests a proactive and ownership-driven approach.

items: investeren we wereldwijd voortdurend in de ontwikkeling van onze teamleden
onboardingtraining van het team (technisch en niet-technisch) op tijd af te ronden
